                          AREA ||.text||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  LCD_MixColors256 PROC
;;;40     */
;;;41     LCD_COLOR LCD_MixColors256(LCD_COLOR Color, LCD_COLOR BkColor, unsigned Intens) {
000000  b410              PUSH     {r4}
;;;42       /* Calc Color seperations for FgColor first */
;;;43       U32 R = (Color & 0xff)    * Intens;
000002  b2c3              UXTB     r3,r0
000004  fb03f402          MUL      r4,r3,r2
;;;44       U32 G = (Color & 0xff00)  * Intens;
000008  f400437f          AND      r3,r0,#0xff00
00000c  4353              MULS     r3,r2,r3
;;;45       U32 B = (Color & 0xff0000)* Intens;
00000e  f400007f          AND      r0,r0,#0xff0000
000012  fb00fc02          MUL      r12,r0,r2
;;;46       /* Add Color seperations for BkColor */
;;;47       Intens = 256 - Intens;
000016  f5c27080          RSB      r0,r2,#0x100
;;;48       R += (BkColor & 0xff)     * Intens;
00001a  b2ca              UXTB     r2,r1
00001c  fb024200          MLA      r2,r2,r0,r4
;;;49       G += (BkColor & 0xff00)   * Intens;
000020  f401447f          AND      r4,r1,#0xff00
000024  fb043300          MLA      r3,r4,r0,r3
;;;50       B += (BkColor & 0xff0000) * Intens;
000028  f401017f          AND      r1,r1,#0xff0000
00002c  fb01c000          MLA      r0,r1,r0,r12
;;;51       R = (R >> 8);
000030  0a11              LSRS     r1,r2,#8
;;;52       G = (G >> 8) & 0xff00;
000032  f44f427f          MOV      r2,#0xff00
000036  ea022213          AND      r2,r2,r3,LSR #8
;;;53       B = (B >> 8) & 0xff0000;
00003a  f44f037f          MOV      r3,#0xff0000
00003e  ea032010          AND      r0,r3,r0,LSR #8
;;;54       return R + G + B;
000042  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
;;;55     }
000044  bc10              POP      {r4}
000046  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1              ;54
000048  4770              BX       lr
;;;56     
                          ENDP
